text: The Two Rivers Correctional Institution is a state prison for men located in Umatilla, Umatilla County, Oregon on the Columbia River, owned and operated by the Oregon Department of Corrections. The facility opened in 1999, was completed in 2000, and holds a maximum of 1632 inmates at a mix of medium and minimum security levels. ==References== == External links == * local press description Category:Prisons in Oregon Category:Buildings and structures in Umatilla County, Oregon Category:1999 establishments in Oregon
title: Two Rivers Correctional Institution
